aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-1247-127 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Power distribution unit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 11/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 14/09/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 12/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 16/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 19/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Power distribution unit malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
